name: SODASTRO
description:
SODASTRO

(MADE FOR THE SODA GAME JAM)

Load up your soda jetpack and fly to the skies, picking up space soda for points! But watch out for the constant asteroid belts you will fly through!

Use A and D, or Left and Right arrow to control.

CREDITS:

BOPPIN TUNES: JELLYFISHEDM(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVgVvwOzvsR8pRwVy316SyA)

SFX AND SPRITES: EVANCLUBYT(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdkHxFQnvyIKHSPcRRu-9PQ)

CODING AND ADDITIONAL SPRITES:MAGNUSSTROM(https://twitter.com/C0nfuzzl3dis)

Edit the code on github! https://github.com/MagnusStrom/SodAstro
